data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: My dream job is to become an early childhood teacher. Early childhood teachers help children to develop language and vocabulary skills as well as elementary numeracy, physical and social skills. To become an early childhood teacher, I will need to complete at least four years of tertiary study, including an accredited teacher education program, at a recognized university or higher education institution. The hardest thing about this job is that you have to be really patient to children because sometimes they can be annoying and keep bothering you. （88 字）
data.referenceText: Describe your dream job, what does it involve? What qualifications or experience do you need? What would be the hardest thing about this job?
data.referenceTranslate: 描述你梦想的工作，它包括什么? 你需要什么资格或经验? 这份工作最难的是什么?
